channel.title: Overview on DragonFly Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on DragonFly Documentation

item.title: What Is Dragonfly?
item.description: Dragonfly is an intelligent P2P-based image and file distribution tool. It aims to improve the efficiency and success rate of file transferring, and maximize the usage of network bandwidth, especially for the distribution of larget amounts of data, such as application distribution, cache distribution, log distribution, and image distribution.

item.title: Terminology
item.description: This topic lists the common terms used throughout Dragonfly.
